snippet: Federal health officials said they failed to detect the presence of enterovirus 68 in samples of spinal fluid taken from nine children suspected of developing a neurologic illness linked to the infection.
abstract: Federal health officials said they failed to detect the presence of enterovirus 68 in samples of spinal fluid taken from nine children suspected of developing a neurologic illness linked to the infection.

headline.main: Enterovirus 68 and Paralysis Link Remains Uncertain
